name: zeit.de Better Dark Mode
description:
A custom dark mode for German news outlet Zeit.de. 

Using the media query `prefers-color-scheme:dark`, it is only effective if your OS is currently set to dark, too.

See it in action: https://cln.sh/JAAr5y
additional_info:
v0.1

I created this quickly because it was a pain reading the site at night. 

uBlock and Brave's tracking and ad blocking were active while writing the styles, so there might be bright things that I've missed due to blocking.

I haven't extensively checked all site sections and every possible viewport, so you may very well find areas that are a bit off.

Contact:
https://twitter.com/klickreflex
https://klickreflex.de
